sentences.en: A powerful scent that cools the skin and relaxes the fatigued body.
sentences.cn: 一种清爽肌肤和放松身体疲倦的超劲香味.

sentences.en: After the weekend riding horses in the country - side, I was very fatigued.
sentences.cn: 周末在乡间骑马之后我非常疲惫.

sentences.en: But the boy noticed that his friend seemed older, more easily fatigued.
sentences.cn: 小伙子发现他的朋友好像老了, 容易疲惫.

sentences.en: He is too fatigued to eat.
sentences.cn: 他太疲劳了,不想吃东西.

sentences.en: He was no longer talking, and he seemed very much fatigued.
sentences.cn: 他不再说话, 显得非常疲倦.

sentences.en: He was too fatigued to care much.
sentences.cn: 他累成这样,也无心过问.

sentences.en: I was fatigued with work [ with sitting up all night ].
sentences.cn: 我因工作 [ 熬夜 ] 而疲乏.

sentences.en: I've been feeling fatigued ( tired ) for a year or so.
sentences.cn: 我感到 疲乏 已经有一年左右了.

sentences.en: Not devoid of sympathy, the policeman's face also expressed a fatigued skepticism.
sentences.cn: 这位警察的脸上虽然不乏同情, 但也露出一种不胜其烦的怀疑表情.

sentences.en: Often she slept only two or three hours a night, she said, and felt endlessly fatigued.
sentences.cn: 她说她每天只能睡两、三小时, 总是感到周身困乏.
萨拉看上去脸色苍白，精疲力竭。

sentences.en: Should the swimmer become fatigued, it is restful to swim on the back or float.
sentences.cn: 游泳者感到疲劳的时候, 可以安静的仰泳或者漂浮在水上.

sentences.en: Unlike a barbarian , however, a rage drake is not fatigued after raging.
sentences.cn: 和野蛮人不同, 狂暴龙兽在狂暴之后不会力竭.

sentences.en: Winter weather can leave you feeling fatigued and tired.
sentences.cn: 冬季会让人感觉疲乏无力。

sentences.en: You become very fatigued when you run too low on carbohydrates.
sentences.cn: 体内醣的储量过低会使人变得很虚.

phrases.tran_cn: 慢性疲劳综合征；慢性疲劳症候群
疲劳失效；疲劳破坏；疲劳断裂
